description: Returns a tuple of (index, session) but filters the sessions returned to only those active for a node.
name: session_node

consistency.description: The consistency mode to use reads.

dc.description: The datacenter that this agent will communicate with.

node.description: The node to use in the filter when listing active sessions.

wait.description: The maximum duration to wait (e.g. '10s') to retrieve a given index.
